petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Register the case as Special Pocso act.

Accused Nur Amin Khan is produced from jail hajot. Seen the accused. Copy is furnished to the accused. Perused the case record. Heard both sides. It appears that there are sufficient materials u/s 4 of POCSO Act against the accused. charge is framed u/s 4 of POCSO Act against the accused. The charge is readover and explained to the accused to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Issue summon to all witnesses. Remand the accused till 21-01-2020. seen the B.P vide 81/2020 for the accused. Perused the case record. Heard both sides. It is submitted that the accused shall face the trial. Considering all, the accused is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 3000/ with a surety of like amount. Fixing 21-01-2020 for evidence.Lateron bail bond submitted by bailor Antaj ali along with related land document for the accused NUr Amin Khan which is checked verified and found correct and accepted. Issue R/o fixing as before.
Accused Nur Amin Khan is present. No witnesses are present. Issue fresh summon to the witnesses. Fixing 27-01-2020 for evidence.
Accused Nur Amin Kha is present. No witnesses are present. Issue fresh summon to witnesses. Fixing 06-02-2020 for evidence.

Accused is present. Witness Monowara Begum and Sahidur Rahman are present. Witness Monowara Begum is examined cross examined and discharged. Other witnesses could not be examined due to paucity of time. Witness is allowed to go on PR bond. Issue summon to witnesses. Fixing 17-02-2020 for evidence.

Accused is present. Witnesses namely Sahidur Rahman and Mottakin Hoque are present, they are examined, cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to all remaining witnesses. Fixing 27-02-2020 for evidence.
CR Put up today as P.O is on CL
Accused is present. Witness Aminu Hoque is present, he is examined and discharged. Issue summon to all remaining witnesses. Fixing 16-03-2020 for evidence.
Accused is present. Witness Anowar Ali is present, she is examined,cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to the remaining witnesses. Fixing 26-03-2020 for evidence.
Due to preventive measure to fight against the outbreak of the Novel Corona Virus Covid 19 case is adjourned today.
